message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you this amazing product! It's a unique opportunity to own a one-of-a-kind item that I'm sure you'll love. Would you like to make an offer for it?
I'm interested in the product, but $120 is a bit steep for me. Would you be willing to consider a lower price?
I understand you're looking for a better deal, Bob. I'm willing to meet you halfway, but I need to make a profit. How about we discuss a price of $105?
I appreciate your willingness to compromise, but $105 is still a bit out of my budget. Would you be willing to consider a price of $95?
I'm getting close to my minimum price, Bob. I'm willing to meet you at $100, but I need to make sure I'm not leaving any money on the table. Can we do $100 and call it a deal?
I'm getting close to walking away, but I still think we can find a mutually beneficial price. Would you be willing to meet me at $92?
I'm not quite ready to give up on this deal, Bob. I'm willing to make one more concession. How about we meet at $97.50?
I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, but I'm still not comfortable with $97.50. Would you be willing to meet me at $90?
I'm not going to give up on this deal yet, Bob. I'm willing to make one more concession. How about we meet at $96?
I'm getting close to walking away, but I still think we can find a mutually beneficial price. Would you be willing to meet me at $88?
